content: IDT - ES MDH | IDT | ES | IPR | Admin HomePeoplePublicationsOrganizationProjectsOpen PositionsAbout ESContactNewsEvents MDH Home IDT Home IDT Education Mohammad Ashjaei, Associate Professor, Docent E-mail: mohammad.ashjaei@mdu.se Room: U1-142 Phone: +4621151772 Division: Division of Networked and Embedded Systems Research groups: Complex Real-Time Embedded Systems Heterogeneous systems - hardware software co-design Web: Personal homepage Official university homepage Linkedin page BiographyResearchPublicationsProjectsPhD studentsMSc theses About me: I am a senior lecturer with a docent diploma at Mälardalen University (MDU) working at the Networked and Embedded Systems department. I am affiliated with the Complex Real-Time Embedded Systems (CORE) and the Heterogeneous Systems - Hardware Software Co-design (HERO) research groups. I have received my PhD degree in Computer Science and Engineering from MDU (back then MDH) in November 2016, and after that until April 2020 I was an associate researcher at MDU. My doctoral dissertation is on resource reservation for industrial switched Ethernet networks. Research: Since May 2020 I am a senior lecturer at MDU in the area of data communication for embedded systems. I have received my docent diploma in Dec 2021. My main focus of research is on resource reservation in communication, where the communication can be in different context, such as automation networks, automotive networks, as well as cloud and fog communication infrastructures. I am also interested in predictability analysis, design configuration, dynamic and adaptive configurations, and software development of real-time communication networks in various domains. I have worked (and still working) in several research projects in different roles that can be found in the "Projects" section. Main applicant of the in-progress project:FLEXATION: 2024-2027 Co-applicant of the in-progress projects:iSecure: 2023-2026SEINE: 2023-2026AORTA: 2023-2025PROVIDENT: 2020-2024INTERCONNECT: 2021-2025 Co-applicant of the finished projects: FIESTA: 2019-2023DESTINE: 2019-2021 Member of the following projects: MARC - Mälardalen University Automation Research CenterXPRES - Excellence in Production Research  Teaching: Besides research I am teaching topics related to data communications in various bachelor and master courses. I have lectures in embedded systems courses, such as data communication for embedded systems, embedded systems I, embedded systems II, and distance course in IoT fundamentals. I have also given several guest lectures in Porto University, Aveiro University, Eindhoven University of Technology, Volvo Construction Equipment, HIAB, to name some.Community services: I am a reviewer for many international journals and conferences including RTS, TII, TIE, TECS, WFCS, RTAS, DATE, ETFA, ISORC, IECON and INDIN. Program chair for topic E2 at Design, Automation and Test in
